about.goal: I am experienced in leveraging agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition.

experience.position: Project Manager & Digital Business Transformation Analyst
experience.desc: Analyze and evaluate business practices engineering, design, define scope, objectives and formulate processes to parallel overall business strategies.
achievment: Created and presented the major key performance indicators for the Umrah sector.
Developed the anuual operating plan for the Umrah sector.
Conducted a research about the decrease of the number of Mu`tamirs (Umrah performers) during Maharm and Shawal months.
Lead and designed an e-consumer platform (MAQAM) from the idea to the operation.
Documented and analyzing the business processes for the Umrah sector.
Designed the To-Be processes based on the strategic objective of the Ministry.
Lead the inclusive service centers program.

experience.desc: Taught Level 4 Information Technology course, and helped the student beyond the set classes with the assignments on he how to use HTML, CSS, Database, and productivity applications running on different operating systems such as Linux.

As a member of the Unitec Application Packaging Team I am responsible for the processing of Windows 7 application packages using a Microsoft application packaging framework. As a team we are responsible for meeting package deadlines, ensuring quality and facilitating the resolution of package defects. Daily tasks involve the management, scheduling, redistribution and quality assurance of packaging tasks within the team, regular communications with the client, offshore team (Malaysia) and local project team. Tasks also include the review and refinement of the packaging process as the project evolves.
experience.tools: SCCM (System Centre Configuration Manager), Migrate GPO, Lotus Notes Database, Active Directory.
